å¤§é™¸äººä¿‚hallä¿‚ä½”å°‘æ•¸ã—å’‹ é»è§£è¦localåŒåŸ‹å¤–åœ‹äººå°±çŸ–ä½¢åœ° å«å•²å¤§é™¸å­¸ç”Ÿå’ªæ’šè½é»ä¿‚å””ä¿‚ä»²æœ‰æ•ˆå‘€

ğŸ“£ğŸ”ˆâ—Urgent Messageâ—*Subject to the official announcement from hall office later tongiht*
In light of the past SARS experience (7-week class suspension) and the press release from Professor Gabriel Leung (Dean of Faculty of Medicine)stating that the situation may escalate in the coming months, our hall will implement several policies including setting up *Quarantine Floors* in order to safeguard our hallmate's health, life and wellbeing. Since students from the affected areas are returning to hall in coming days, we have to clear several lower floors (accessible through stairs) for the time being to act as Quarantine Floors *by tomorrow (28 Jan 2020)*

There are several ways to clear your rooms

(1) Come back to tidy up by yourself
(2) Ask your friends to tidy up
(3) Office to tidy up and store your stuff safely

You may choose to
(1) Check out from hall (encouraged)
(2) Store your things at hall
(3) Move to a room on upper floors

In return for your kind cooperation, we will
(1) *Refund the hall fees paid* (amount to be discussed) if you quit the hall tomorrow.
(2) *You can check in again as soon as school starts again*.
